resources.string:
This is an adventure type game based on the allegorical novel, Pilgrim's Progress written by John Bunyan in 1678. You must guess North, South, East or West to move to the next level. You will also have to answer Bible questions. If you wander off into the woods or if you lose all your points you will have to start over.


Please send any comments or questions on this game to gicthus.inc@gmail.com.
